name: Carphero (JPCard, Maxi Perez)
description:
Experience the thrill of running as a delivery man at a seaside resort. Inspired by the beaches an argentine coast city named Mar del Plata, your job is to take orders and make deliveries to collect as much tip as possible before time runs out!

In this game you take the place of the Carphero. Your job is to reach to the clients tents and grant them their request as fast as you can. The more you deliver, the bigger the tip. Easy enough, right? Just remember the day doesn't last forever and that running on sand could get really difficult. Have fun and became yourself the best Carphero ever!

---

How to play

----------------Keyboard----------------
Run -> WASD | arrow keys 

Pick -> Left mouse click | Spacebar 

Throw -> Right mouse click | Left Shift

Pause -> Esc

----------------Gamepad----------------

Run -> Left stick | D-pad 

Pick -> X (PlayStation) | A (Xbox) | R1 | RB

Throw -> Square | X (Xbox) | R2 | RT

Pause -> Start

Playing this game with a gamepad is highly recommended.

Show your support

We loved working on this game and still have a lot of ideas to keep developing it. If you like this game and enjoy playing it, we really appreciate your support in any way you can: share, donate, like, comment, everything helps and it lets us know that there is at least a small community of people who would like to see what this game could get to be!

Thanks to all the Carpheros out there, for us you are the best!

Here is a link to our discord community: https://discord.gg/QaHuJXudPu
